channel.title: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation
channel.description: Hi, I setup everything correctly but i can't access any onion website with Firefox or Edge. But it works with the Whonix workstation. The "check.torproject(dot)org" is also showing that everything is fine. Here are my Windows Workstation settings: IP address: 10.152.152.16 Subnet: 255.255.192.0 Gateway: 10.152.152.10 Preferred DNS Server: 10.152.152.10 +Firefox setting: network.dns.blockDotOnion = false

item.title: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation

This has to be really be put into the Documentations.

item.title: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation
item.dc:creator: LuxLOL
item.description:
I did again found it out how i did it again one year ago.
This has to be really be put into the Documentations.
Go To: Control Panel → Internet Options → Connections → LAN settings → Advanced.
And now in “Socks” enter “10.152.152.10” and in “Port” enter “9150” and empty out everything else and then click three times on “OK”, done.

Read full topic
item.source: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation

item.title: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation
item.dc:creator: Peace_in_process
item.description:
We can not access onion websites on regular firefox. “check.torproject(dot)org” is not onion but regular site. So it will work

To access onion sites, use tor browser…

Read full topic
item.source: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation

item.title: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation
item.dc:creator: LuxLOL
item.description:
Hi,
I setup everything correctly but i can’t access any onion website with Firefox or Edge. But it works with the Whonix workstation. The “check.torproject(dot)org” is also showing that everything is fine.
Here are my Windows Workstation settings:
IP address: 10.152.152.16
Subnet: 255.255.192.0
Gateway: 10.152.152.10
Preferred DNS Server: 10.152.152.10
+Firefox setting: network.dns.blockDotOnion = false

Read full topic
item.source: Can’t access hidden services from my VM Windows Workstation
